content: take an instant/immediate dislike to sb

 put a ~ on sb/sth

answer: feel sorry about sth you have done

become calmer, more relaxed and less excited
(of sb’s situation or business) start to become better after a difficult period

unkind; unpleasant (SYN mean)

If sth bad is your fault, you made it happen.

when you are ready
